title: Quick question Riot about Elementalist Lux
body: I just wanted to know if you are going to create new profile banner arts for this skin? it feels weird how we have only 1 art and some of the icons don't match at all, Udyr and Sona have nice ones and since this is a ultimate skin, I believe there should be more to this purchase. Is there anything you can do as in add more elements to the profile banner art maybe? It would be nice thats all I am asking. Thanks for the read!

replies.body: I'm pretty sure this is all they're offering: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/elementalist-lux/infos
